Review Content: I have been listening to the CBC Radio One programming on my mobile phone. Since the recent change of the app to a more pictorial appearance, the play function is no longer as effective. Program broadcasts are dropped quite frequently with a comment: "sorry, something went wrong...." My only option to get the CBC program back up again would be to uninstall and reinstall it. This is most frustrating. Why is this happening? What is the fix?

All I want is to be able to listen to my local CBC Radio One station. Not much to ask, I think. The CBC Radio app was generally pretty good. This recent replacement is simply unusable. It crashes as soon as I run it on my LG G4, while still managing to insist on knowing my location. Sorry, CBC, much as I love you, you don't get to spy on where I am.

The app does not work. I consistantly get an error message saying, "oops something went wrong." I have tried everything suggested on the help page and I wrote to CBC for assistance but recieved no response. What is most frustrating is that CBC won't even acknowledge that there is a problem, which there clearly is considering all the complaints and the average user rating of 1.5 stars! Give us back the old app until this one is properly developed. I did not sign up for the beta program!!!
Reply Content: Oh no! We sincerely apologize for the troubles you've had with the app. We'd be happy to take a look into this for you, please contact us at cbclisten@cbc.ca. Thank you.

Review Content: Whatever the devs did to CBC Radio app in mid-August caused periodic cut-outs. Transitioning to CBC Listen, the issue still persists. I've sent feedback to devs. Not sure if any fixes have been done. Seems like cut-out has improved slightly since feedback...can't really tell for sure. But I can say cut-out is still there and it's getting to the point where I want to uninstall this app. Update: I've uninstalled this app. General radio app works much better. I wish I had left earlier...

This app replaces the CBC Radio App and removed the most important feature. Being able to download episodes. It was the only reason I used it, to download segments and not use my phone's data while travelling. They say it will be available in the future, but for now it's a massive disappointment. The interface is fancy, but overall the app is a disappointment.

No volume. It plays but I can't hear anything. The new app has no news browsing function. In the former CBC Radio app, I could browse for featured stories. I now need two separate CBC apps to do the job one used to do. It also repeatedly drops service or refuses to play and shuts down. I've reinstalled it 7x. It also refuses to shut off if the screen is open to the app itself. It doesn't seem connected to the Android volume/play controls at all.

Really, really bad. Ditto what problems everyone else is saying is wrong. Listen up CBC! They are not joking! Better get the developers back to the drawing board to fix the myriad of problems ASAP. Might as well bring back the old app that actually worked reasonably well while we wait. Classic good app gone to garbage. So sad.

Not ready for prime time yet. And the old app is gone! Shows are mislabeled. Can't set to save a particular location as with the old one. Pain in the butt having to scroll through multiple shows to find the one you want. In the old app i could set it to radio one toronto and it would automatically play whatever was on. Also keeps crashing and dropping the feed. Hope for an update soon.

Absolutely terrible! What happened to the old app? It was easy to find programs and to listen to recorded pods, on demand. Horrible vertical non-search scroll is irritating! I don't want to scroll through every lame CBC program in order to find the one I want! This is like department stores forcing you to walk through the perfume section when you Just Want To Get To Underwear And Buy Socks! No no no no! Please bring back the old app! I can't find my shows!
Reply Content: Sorry for the frustration! On Demand, CBC Podcasts and Music Playlists , you can search by tapping "All Shows" (previously-aired)  or "All Podcasts" or "All Playlists" (by genre). Hope that helps!

Review Content: I used to listen to CBC Radio One, Montreal, every morning, but can't now since the old app was replaced. The new "listen live" feature looks like it is running, but there is no audio. I have deleted and reinstalled the app and it still doesn't work. Why didn't CBC just keep the old app that worked so well?

I don't think disappointing covers it. I loved the old app, I was able to download podcasts and news segments and listen to them on the subway and on my commute. Now I have to stream everything, which means I can't use it on the subway, and if I'm not on the subway, I have to use a huge amount of data that I cannot afford. Most people have alternatives (for example can listen to CBC radio in their cars) but I do not own a radio. Very, very disappointed.
Reply Content: To assist with this issue, it would be helpful to have a little bit more information. Can you send any screenshots related to the issue along with your device details at cbclisten@cbc.ca? Thanks.

Review Content: Very poor navigation. No search option in home, can't find scheduled for live radio. Main consideration when building the app was pushing specific shows and advertising, not the users.
Reply Content: Hi, sorry for the inconvenience. We will surely improve our app based on your feedback.

Review Content: Disappointing replacement of the previous radio app. This version is unwieldly and alienating. It is time-consuming to find material to listen to and "my radio" collection has disappeared with no apparent way to recreate continuous playlists. The app tries to do too much and so does them all poorly. It frequently glitches and won't play. Thanks for a pointless up-date CBC. It's better and easier now to just use Google podcast than this app.

Unlike some reviews here I didn't *love* the old app, but it usually did what I needed it to. The new app basically doesn't work. I use it solely for listening to live radio and the stream drops constantly, whether I'm in wifi or data. Sometimes it restarts on it's own and sometimes I have to close the app and restart to get it working again. Absolute garbage, as are most government type IT projects.

I just wanted to listen to the radio, but the new app doesn't work at all. Uninstall and reinstall all you want,nothing. On the website there are advertisments, and i'm already paying the cbc through taxes, if you minimize the window it stops playing altogether like youtube.I just want to listen to the radio but it's an incredible chore now with this horrible new app and the nasty website interface. Bring back the functionallity of the old app or im voting conservative. Terrible and unusable!

Bring back the old app...this new one sucks! It requires you to share your location which drains your phone battery, AND there is no search functionality for topics. I used to love searching in the old app to learn about relevant topics from a variety of different shows. Now I'm at the mercy of the endless scroll...also, some shows like Frontburner are now classified as podcasts which means I can't bookmark individual episodes for later. Thanks for nothing CBC! :(

I can no longer listen to radio on my way to work. This app used to work flawlessly but the newest overhaul has made it mostly unusable. Some days it works fine, then other times it wont connect, or it will cinnect after I've walked 30min to work. "Please insure mobile data is turned on" dont even. The only issue here is this app.

Like many others (it seems) the app simply doesn't play anything for me. I'm on a samsung galaxy s6. I have gps turned off. Nothing strange or special about my phone. The app opens, and anytime I try to play anything it says that playback failed. Previous app worked great basically all the time. Big cbc fan, but this new "cbc listen" app is useless to me since I literally can't listen to anything.

Replacing the old app with a new one that is very different without any warning is unprofessional. I thought there was something wrong with my phone because the icon for the old app simply disappeared from my start screen. I found the new one, which has a new name so I wasn't even sure it was the intended replacement until after I installed it and tried it out. Redesigned apps always take a while to get used to but this one is truly not an improvement.

Not as user friendly as the previous version. Glitchy, and you need to click through many screens just to access your favourite news programs every morning. Bleah. CBCs only option, so using it daily. Edit: minus a star. Very glitcty. Please bring back the previois version so I can listen to my programs. Debators, world report, as it happens, and under the inflience stop mid segment.

Disappointed! Didn't love the old app, but it worked well enough, and I could find things easily. Other than aesthetics everything else was a fail for me on the new app. I couldn't access much of anything while travelling abroad either, so I deleted the app while on the road. Hopefully improvements are in the works and then maybe I'll give it another try.
Reply Content: Can you please share which features you find difficult to use? Please contact us at cbclisten@cbc.ca.

Review Content: App is impossible to use! No search function anywhere to be found, you can toggle between podcasts and radio shows, but apparently they haven't accounted that some podcasts ARE radio shows. Radio shows listed are not in any particular order. Some are alphabetical and some are by 'recently played' (which doesn't make sense coz As It Happens was not recently played no matter what time zone you're in. Why does CBC change their format/platform every 12-15 months for no reason? Your tax $$ at work...

Review Content: Had a CBC radio app, and it's gone, like the icon is missing. Found this on the back page of my phone. All my downloads are gone. This thing plays for awhile, and goes silent. So frustrated, app drops connection constantly on my pixel 2, perhaps once every 10 minutes - completely unacceptable. Review Content: Ok. Time to rage. You updated an app that needed no update. Instead of being able to conveniently find and listen to radio shows, and updates, now everything is damn confusing with no easy to find search bar. How do i find news recaps like the 6pm news or 10 minute update? Oh and apparently power and politics no longer exists. It wasnt broken, you didnt have to fix it, now I am waking up, cant find my news, and Im PISSED. Listened every day, now Ill never get to listen again. BRING BACK OG MODE

App frequently stops playing randomly. When I go to check on the playback, the app does not save where it stopped so I have find the spot in the playback. This happened several times duirng one show. when this app was updated all of my saved shows were erased. And the interface has been completely changed and not very intuitive. Takes much longer to find what you want compared to the old interface. I love CBC 1 but the poor quality of this app definitely puts me off from using it much.

I've been a CBC Radio listener for more than 35 years. I don't keep a radio at home anymore as I stream everything online and I used to love the old CBC Radio app. This new app has given me nothing but problems as it stops in the middle of live shows, tells me that I can't stream certain shows saying I'm not in Canada (I'm in Toronto!) and when it decides to actually function is consistently unresponsive to skip/ff/rewind. I've uninstalled/reinstalled twice and uninstalling for the last time.

The app is very poorly laid out. Your favorites are buried in 3 levels of menus, which makes it easier to search for the show everytime. Often, the shows like the world this hour are missing or just play 5 mins of dead air. And lately, The app has been showing me an error that this show can only be played in Canada. I am in Alberta, not using a VPN. This app is terrible. I'll be getting my news elsewhere from now on. Uninstalled.
Reply Content: That doesn't sound right! Can you give us more information at cbclisten@cbc.ca so that we can investigate.

Review Content: The app does not work. All the reviews since it rolled out have been negative. Nothing has been done. I called the cbc to leave a complaint. If this keeps up I'm going to call my MP. Not because I love cbc radio THAT much. But because over a billion dollars of Canadians money is paying for CRUD like this. Someone deserves to be sacked. And the person above them deserves to be sacked for not sacking them sooner.

This app seems very buggy. It replaced the previous cbc radio app which at least worked. When listening to live radio it cuts out alot to the point of not being useable. Also I am not able to pause the app from my lock screen dispite it working before the update and the app starts playing again at random even after pausing it. Only way I could get it to say off was to close the app completely.

It's a jarring change from the old apps simple and intuitive category structure. It is very hard to browse by subject/content and instead the layout is program/personality centric. This reminds me of the NPR one app launch. At least in that case they left the old news app alone. Unfortunately all this app does is drive me to reliable standbys instead like apple podcasts and Spotify where it's now easier to get my CBC content. If that seems lazy, welcome to the internet CBC üòâ

Why can't I use this app to download last week's episode of Quirks and Quarks for offline listening? It's available on the cbc's website as an mp3, so why not here? This makes no sense. The previous app, you could easily download segments of the show, now this is only possible with podcasts, which doesn't include any of the major radio shows!!! You guys messed up big time. Come on, CBC! Fix this mess.
Reply Content: We're sorry this is so frustrating! Due to our current rights management agreement, we are unable to release certain shows for offline listening via the app. We do aim to have more On Demand content available for offline listening again very soon. We are listening and aim to improve the your experience. Thank you.

Review Content: I can't provide a proper review because this app and the other CBC apps never work properly. Someday CBC will get it right. ( The app fails to load)
Reply Content: Thank you for your feedback and we are deeply sorry for the inconvenience. Can you please share the problem with us in more detail so that we can improve our app. Please contact us via the user settings, we really want to hear from you.

Review Content: A truly awful experience. The previous and now missing cbc radio app was fantastic. This piece of auto update junk is just terrible. It flat out does not work on my S6 and will not play any live content. Additionally I refuse to enable.location which now prohibits me from accessing non live content. Way to go CBC, you have destroyed a previously critical way of connecting with your service. Thankfully.I also have an iphone with the old app still enabled. I wish there was less than 1 star.

The latest update removed my ability to select the programs I favor by the date of broadcast and topic. The new version is hit and miss and basically too time consuming. I would like to see the favorites applying the latest episode by default. It seems the people designing this app have never really used it.

This has never worked with my 2019 Warlock. Every action fails, not a single function has ever worked. Extensive time on the phone with customer service got nowhere. Trying the SOS button on the mirror as per their suggestion not only did not connect, but the system was then stuck in an endless loop of trying unsuccessfully to send an SOS signal. The only way I could stop that was to disconnect the truck battery for a period of time. Uconnect is unmitigated rubbish.
Reply Content: Hi Clint, we apologize for any issue you might be having! Could you send details of what you are experiencing to our customer support at socialmedia.uconnect@fcagroup.com? ~ Jivona

Sorry, originally we did a bad job of explaining tokens. In fact 95% of parties are completely free. Guests earn lots of free tokens for requesting and voting (enough every 15 mins to request 3 new songs or vote on 7 songs).

More details: https://jukestar.mobi/tokens-wont-cause-issues-and-well-explain-why/

Hopefully you‚Äôll give it another try

Hey Frederik, we carefully designed the token system so guests can have an awesome time for free. Guests earn plenty of free tokens for voting and requesting (enough every 15 mins to request 3 new songs or vote on 7 songs).

Review Content: This app had so much potential until I found out that GUESTS MUST PURCHASE TOKENS (or wait ~20 minutes) to request a song. And to add insult to injury, the Jukestar website and app description does not mention this extremely important fact ANYWHERE.  I would gladly have paid big $$ for an app that can host my Spotify account as a jukebox for parties. But I refuse to make my friends sign up for a "Jukestar account" and purchase the right to play songs that I've already paid for.
Reply Content:
Hey Keith, sorry, we didn‚Äôt do a good job explaining tokens. In fact 95% of parties are completely free. Guests earn lots of free tokens for requesting and voting (enough every 15 mins to request 3 new songs or vote on 7 songs).

More details: https://jukestar.mobi/tokens-wont-cause-issues-and-well-explain-why/

Hopefully you‚Äôll give it another try

Review Content: Tokens? No way. Why would people at MY party, listening to MY Spotify want to give YOU money? And I don't even get a cut!  EDIT: What if my party has less than 10 guests? What if it's only 3 or 4 people? Or, what if only a few people care what's playing an no one else participates? This app might work well for large groups (if everyone is really active in participating), but what about smaller, more intimate get togethers? Do I really need to put out fliers for my small dinner/cocktail party? Is your target market only weddings or frat parties?  As an aside, the client app isn't very practical either. It should just be a web link. If I did happen to have a party big enough to be able to use this app, you expect me to explain to each person as they arrive that they have to download, install, and set up a brand new app? What about a wedding with a guest list of hundreds? You expect me to hire a tech support guy to walk around and help Grandma Eunice get her app set up so she can hear the song she likes? I have enough to do and pay for as host. This doesn't make my job easier.
Reply Content:
Hey Trevor, good news is guests get plenty of free tokens. In fact more than 95% of guests (98% last fortnight) have an awesome time partying without paying a cent. More info in our blog: https://jukestar.mobi/tokens-wont-cause-issues-and-well-explain-why/
P.S. The money we get from the few guests who do pay goes toward the cost of the servers.

Review Content: Deleting it! It doesn't let you upload playlists from spotify to get things started, and all I want is an app that let me play smoothly part of a song. Reply Content: Hey Rosie, it sounds like you are after something quite different to Jukestar. You can certainly choose one of your own playlists to use as suggestions in the party. However Jukestar is focused on social song requests, not auto cue dj-ing of a single playlist.

Can you please update to HiFy's new version 1.3, manually publish the device to Spotify witin the app and try again? Please contact me via e-mail at support@hify.eu for any help :) Kind regards from Germany.

Review Content: I wanted to try free version before buying but the trial version shows the wifi sound systems but when I click on them, A message asks to open Spotify but still won't play on my system. Does this app support YouTube or music from any other source to play like airplay?
Reply Content: Hey Ali, HiFy simulates a "Spotify Connect"-device for each found receiver. You have to open Spotify after opening HiFy, start a song and then use Spotify's "Remote playback"-feature. This works with Spotify Premium only. To stream _any_ audio from any app, the only way is by "rooting" your Android and use my second app "AirAudio". Kind regards.

Reply Content: Hey Sean, thanks for the feedback. It's likely, that your DLNA-receiver does not support HiFy's default audio-format LPCM. Please try again with WAV or OGG inside HiFy's DLNA-settings. Contact me at support@hify.eu and we will get it working for you if the audio-format doesn't do the trick. Kind regards from Germany :-)

I like how biostrap designed their strap to help us know our hrv 24/7. Unfortunately, their hardware is the problem. When I received my band, it failed to get the biometrics and failed to capture my sleep. So support team had the band replaced. Once I got the replacement sensor. It was what I dreamed of having. Getting the HRV readings both night and day. But the hardware is the problem here. Its not charging now even with another charger. Only 2 weeks. I lost $160 or more for this band.
The interface between phone and strap is horrible. Don't purchase

I am a long time user of biostrap. I have the full package, however I would strongly advise against purchasing. The sync time is excessive, I'm not particularly impressed with its accuracy or metrics. I attempted to sync today and the app just crashes.

I would avoid this product at all costs! Almost everything they claim is 
aspirational not reality. The readings are wildly inaccurate, rendering 
them useless for real biometric feedback. The unit won't stay changed for 
more than 14 hours, meaning you constantly have to re-charge the thing. 
Also the foot pod interface is garbage. Lost mi e on the second run. They 
wamt $100.00 to replace it. I was already stupid enough to buy this thing, 
I certainly am not going to spend another $100. 00!

Bought the total health bundle with high hopes and a lot of excitement, but was disappointed in almost every way.  App did not reliably capture sleep, could not edit sleep times, are just a few of the issues with the Android app.  Very responsive online customer service from Cyan, but should not need it in the first place.  Then after about a week, the wrist sensor all of a sudden stopped working.  Would not connect, etc.  Tried everything in the FAQs and dialed up Cyan once again. Very responsive again, but clearly not given the appropriate guidelines from his/her leaders.  I was told that my wrist sensor was "in a state of Brick" and that I would need to wait 3 days for the battery to drain fully, then try to charge and connect, and if that didn't work, wait an additional day, and try again, then if that still didn't work, they would replace it BUT only after my return package had been scanned by USPS.  Then, and only then, would they send me a replacement and they could not overnight it.  Clearly they don't have the product working right, they don't have their processes and customer service policies dialed in, and those are always result of inexperienced leadership.  Too bad!

I've spent hours trying to use the Biostrap.  Be prepared to spend all of your time trying to get it to connect to the device. If you manage to connect for a time, then struggle with recording. If you manage to record any statistics - beware - they are very inaccurate.

Biostrap is junk, stick with FitBit (and it's slight inaccuracies).  Just did a 30 minute workout with the shoepod and it is BLANK, nothing captured, the wristband does not capture anuthing either.  In addition to that, the band and shoepod always get disconnected from the app, and you won't know till you try to synch, only way to reconnect is to reset, then you lose all of your data (assuming it captured any).  Biostrap is a big hulking piece of junk...already back to FitBit, Biostrap is heading to the trash.

Dont bother folks. Use the app next to it in the app store instead. LBC used to be a great app, and I used it for years. This new 'updated' 'improved' experience is anything but. It crashes every single time I open it. Utterly useless. The other app works perfectly, and minus all the 'global' crud that comes with the official app.

If you pause the app for more than 5 minutes, you are unable to pick up from where you listened up to. Every time you try to jump to anywhere that isn't the start of the program it just plays from the start. You are unable to favourite any podcasts, which seems like a simple addition that other apps offer as a standard feature. Every time LBC update their app, it somehow gets worse than the original, in terms of function and use.
No iplayer fond

Everytime I receive a message on my telephone when I'm listening to the LBC or global player app the volume goes down to zero!! This is very annoying because every time this happens I have to remove the telephone for my pocket and increase the volume manually. this is not a problem with my telephone because I installed the apps on my other telephone and the same thing happens. I have already contacted the developers of the apps 3 times but they have shown no interest in resolving my problem

Recently the app has become unusable. I can no.longer listen to live radio or any of the catch up shows without the stream stoping every 30 seconds. It's not a case of buffering because I have high speed broadband in my house. The stream literally stops. I have tried reinstalling but to no avail. Disappointing and unnecessary!
Absolutely useless now. Used to work fine but now it's constantly pauses mid-stream, even with a strong connection. Seriously, how hard can this be to fix? Lots of people having this issue.
The old app was brilliant. I'm trying to download again!! This new one is too complicated!
Very annoying when your listening to the radio you get a message or notification the volume goes and you need to manually go to the programme again

This latest version is far worse than previously. Now there's a 10 second minimum wait for the ad to be skipped. But hey, for anyone reading this you can listen to LBC free and ad free on the UK Radio player app, that's the main one I use to also listen to the Talk Radio station, there's a huge choice of stations on the other one too.

The app has gone from good to junk. Crashes endlessly. You have long unskippable ads before listening to the station. Which has ads. You now have a list of all of the Global Media stations. Takes ages to get started. Time lags and lots of button pushes. Listening to ads and ads in the app too. Greedy. I've gone back to a radio app which plays the station without ads first and has a comprehensive selection of stations instead of just the Global Media ones.
Was working great until last week, now it plays for a few mins and then says "no Internet connection", when there clearly is. Please fix. Still the most broken app there is.

Absolute garbage, can't pause and come back to listen later, download function doesn't work although it will claim to have dowloaded the file there is no way to find it and certainly cannot play it in another (working) player. Such a shame as  I used to enjoy LBC but so long as they are only available through the Global Player app it's just not worth the hassle, hopefully they are not locked into a long contract with these guys and can get on a decent platform in future

Review Content: Catchup freezes EVERY TIME if you pause and want to carry on from the same point later. Please stop playing video adverts at the beginning of a podcast. I listen to catchup in my vehicle. My phone is in a hands free cradle for safety yet someone thought it a good idea to play video clips. I don't want these clips playing on my phone when I just want to listen to something! Poorly designed app.

Truly dreadful. not a patch on the old app. Before being allowed to download podcasts you have to give them access to your files, media & photos. No longer have access to podcasts going back years, just 2 weeks now so I can't get Steve Allen & James O'B past shows. I am bloody furious at Global's contempt for the long term LBC listener. DON'T DOWNLOAD IT.

The app has been very patchy the past couple of days. I listen to about 10 minutes of a show and it decides to freeze, claiming "no internet connection". Strange considering that the show has been downloaded and I have no problems accessing the website. Plus no one seems to be responding to any of the complaints...save yourself some time and do not download, just use the website.

This app used to be very easy to use. Many people are listening on the move, unfortunately because the app is force feeding video advertising to the app users it's very slow to load, and it takes a long time to get to the actual content. I would say it's quite a sly but sloppy move to force the user to watch a video before you can listen to content which had audible advertising within it. I'm inclined to give up on the app and go back to radio because of this greedy approach to access to LBC.
Great radio station. Infuriating app. When listening through the mobile app the radio shuts off every two mins when the screen closes and there is no way to stop it.

Full of bugs. If you stop playing to do something else it usually requires a restart. Often randomly plays different radio stations instead of playing the downloaded show I was previously listening to. Subscriptions are sketchy and only download intermittently, manual downloads often don't work without a restart (show "paused")

Bad app. If you pause playback of a show for more than a minute you can't go back and play it because the app crashes. So you close the app and reopen it only to have to watch another advert, open another two screens before you can get back in and carry on from where you were before. very frustrating.
Player keeps stopping when phone screen goes to sleep. You have to keep lighting up the screen every 2-3 minutes and it will start again.

The app has been ruined and is now absolutely awful. Can't listen for more than a few minutes before the app crashes. Screen saver comes on - app stops working Take a call on my phone - app stops working Randomly starts up playing Classic FM for no reason. Every time the app stops/crashes you need to watch the same 10 second Samsung Galaxy S10 advert and then restart playing the program you were listening to which is a bit difficult while you're driving.

WORST Radio App I've used so far. The Start-Up Adverts run too long and are also very repetitive. Even when you minimise the App you are still troubled greatly with a Player Banner which appears on the top of your screen and obstructs your access to the top Icons and settings on your mobile device screens. All in all its far too obtrusive compared to many other similar Apps.üëé

Love the Station - Hate the App The app used to be good tbh, i dont mind the opening ad (folk have to make money). I dont appreciate it EVERY BLOODY TIME i press pause though. its beyond infuriating. Also the apps volume isnt loud enough for podcasts. I used to be able to get around this when you could download the apps as an MP3 but now you can't. why on earth would you try and make your app worse? ps Dump Farage

This app is really poor. Not only are certain podcasts hard to find but then when you start listening to them you are unable to fast forward or restart from the same position at a later time. It just starts from the beginning again. I really don't know why Global can't get their act together and create a decent working podcast app. I need to listen to Nick Abbot!

Constant crashes if you interrupt the stream with a call or switching Bluetooth devices. I would go as far as to say it is dangerous to try to listen to LBC while driving due to constantly having to mess about with the app. Sometimes ads don't load properly. I would do away with them until the app is stable as every crash means another 10 seconds of an advert that could potentially cause another crash itself. The radio station, however, is excellent, especially Farage. Thank you Donald!

Sadly it now has a massive bug that they aren't fixing. It loads fine and if you click the stop button it does stop. You flick it left and it is gone BUT it has not stopped running. If you tap the LBC icon it reappears but it never shut down. The problem appears if you take a phone call after closing the LBC app, as soon as you end the call the LBC app opens again and blasts out the station, clicking the LBC icon to quickly load and stop the silly thing results in a crash message and you have to force stop the app to actually kill it. I like the app but when it won't close down and ends up blasting out the LBC station while I am in meetings and at other annoying times then it has to go, uninstalled.
Reply Content: Hi Mark, many apologies for the bug playing radio when any other media stops playing. We've just fixed this bug and pushed out an update so hopefully you notice it's back to expected behaviour. Let us know if it is randomly playing and causing disruption again though.

Review Content: Not the best of apps ,very laggy. On startup there's additional adverts which make you wait 10 seconds to get to the main app, don't know why they need this extra advertising as the station itself is full of ads every 10mins ,and it's the same adverts day in day out. With the app running in the background it's not that power hungry ,but if you receive a call, it interrupts the app and you have to go back into the app ,reload it to get it playing again ,not only that, an annoying pop up of sorts

Every time you listen back to a radio show and pause for a second, you cannot resume playing. The play triangle button just doesn't work. I listen to James 'o Brien every day on repeat in the afternoon. Unless I can listen uninterrupted for three hours, I have to switch my phone off and back on several times to resume listening. Rubbish.

Every time you pause the audio it restarts the file. Can you then fast forward to where you were? Absolutely not. It just restarts over and over again. James O'Brien uploads 3 hrs of content per day, and the precise reason the podcasts are great is because it allows for flexible listening. Your god awful player isn't very flexible. Search functionality is pathetic, often get an error message "there's something wrong with playback" after clicking the search button. Genuinely awful app. 0/10.

Having used this app for as long as I can remember it has now become impossible to use , the app now shuts down as soon as the phone screen locks ,you get a notification or you move to another app .. beyond annoying ,impossible to listen to now .I now have to listen on the" Tune in" app instead

one of the worst apps I have ever used. I love listening to the station but the app keeps crashing, does not reconnect to the internet so when the connection drops I have to close the app and re-open it several times. Doesn't even maintain a good wifi connection without constantly crashing.

The show catch up feature has been broken for over half a year now. LBC used to have a Catch Up website. That service was shut down last year and now we are stuck with this broken mobile app. Its over six months now since the app fails to download shows you are subscribed as part of the catch up service. When trying to download it manually, the download pauses at 0% and then silently fails. The company behind it has done nothing to fix the problem.

Unusable if listening to catch up via bluetooth in car as it crashes every few minutes. Will not download and because there are so many menus to navigate and intro video adverts, it is not safe to restart. it also crashes if you need to pause listening and sometimes trying to forward 20 seconds it switches at random from LBC catchups to Classic FM live.

I only used this app to download shows I've missed during the day. The player is very unstable and will pause itself frequently and crash forcing a relaunch. I used to find the file i downloaded and use my stable phone media player instead but for the last few weeks you have changed the audio format so my phone can't recognise them. It's literally impossible to listen to the shows on catch up now, thanks. extremely bad app for such a popular radio station. it's a joke. Using Samsung Galaxy S9+.

You've ruined it! First I have to wait 10 seconds to hit the skip button for the ad that I'm NEVER going to watch. Then I have to "go to LBC" - what's that about? It's an app for LBC! I don't want to listen to the other rubbish. Just LBC on my LBC app! I use this in the car on Bluetooth and I used to be able to resume listening to LBC after I'd been away from the car. Not any more: now it connects me to classic FM! Bring back the last version that did what it was supposed to do.

Used to be ok about a year ago, now it does my head in! How can you keep updating this app for downgrade purposes?! Please sort it out, its embarrassing when other radio apps work so well. 1. Is that silly start add really necessary, especially when it is a commercial radio station? 2. Always hanging/crashing and have to do a forced close and reload, plus that ad again. 3. lucky if catchup works, and if it does, will crash and wont remember where you were, then that ad again! So disappointing..

Terrible as podcast app. Doesn't remember podcasts I listened before, so every time I need to use the search. Jump to specific time forward doesn't work. When I pause playback and use phone for something else, the app just closes/crashes, so have to start it again. Not able to play at increased speed. Not even able to download podcasts without signing up. The only reason to use this app is to listen to LBC podcasts, but the experience is terrible. Better use Google Podcast app.

I am 100% sure the developers have not tested this app. Eg it forces you to enter DOB on profile page but if you are 40 years old, it takes over 500 button presses if you want to input truthfully. Go to any podcast and try to subscribe to it. Let me know when you find the button.... This has the potential to be a really good app as the content is very good but the user interface is atrocious.

I simply LOVE lbc and the variety of shows and views but PLEASE relaunch the old paid for app, this version, as per many other REVIEWS, simply SUCKS. It crashes, restarts, forgets where you were, a text message comes through so the app has a hissy fit and refuses like a scolded child to carry on doing anything. I would genuinely pay over ¬£10 a month just for the app to actually WORK, Nick Abbot simply gives me life and this app is not letting me listen to the King ffs. Please please please SORT

So disappointed. Have used this app since it's launch. It would sometimes crash but mostly was good for me. Following an update last week, the app closes moments after opening. Have tried everything, including clearing cache, reinstalling, clearing space, yet will close every time. Have finally concluded the app is no longer compatible with my smartphone. All my other apps I use update and are still usable. Just this one. Such a shame.
Reply Content: Hi Joe, sorry for this, we've experienced issues with Android 4.4 so have released a new update this week to ensure you can carry on listening as before. Let us know if the issue continues though and we can look at it again.

Review Content: This is one of the worst service downgrade that I ever saw. The online player was perfectly fitted for listening to past program. Example :James o Brian segment was a two hours advertising free and separated from the news. It's now a 3h mess full of advisement and other segment. One question, why?
Every 30 seconds or so the stream just pauses until you wake up the phone again, unlike other radio/music apps that play even when the screen goes dark

5 minutes listening at a time (at best) before restarting. never used to be a major issue until an update recently. As I mostly listen while driving an as such cannot keep restarting the stream it make the app effectively useless . Uninstalled and switched to lbc via global app and so far no more issues

Podcast player won't respond to headphone commands, can't skip forward or back (including downloads) and won't let me subscribe. Have to search every time I launch the app for James O'Brien which is odd given it's an LBC app! Radio player is also now not working! Also if I launch the radio while listening to a catch up, not only wont it launch, but i then literally have ro force stop the app to stop what it's already playing!
Catch up no longer available
Was a great app but Since it updated it keeps saying error occurred try again later
Reply Content: Hi, Thanks Barry for telling us, I will look into this with our development team. Please do contact our customer support team they may be able to help http://global.com/contact/ Thanks - Luke.

Review Content: Listening to a show on Catch Up on LBC, if I pause the show using my earphone button, when I press Play again, the app defaults to playing Classic fm! I then have to scroll through all the options to get back to LBC. The ONLY good thing about the app is that now the show picks up from where I paused it. Not impressed!

Dreadful app, in the last couple of weeks unable to download any shows. App crashes when trying to forward or rewind. lbc go back to paid app which didnt crash, limit downloaded shows to 7 days & was advert free as otherwise this is a real step backwards for a forward thinking station!!

This is a rubbish app install uninstall won't open... if you close the app it won't open can't get catchup any more when you do get it to work it then will not play.. The old app perfect up to 27 February then you have to download new app as old app is now closed same on lap top. Rubbish. Rubbish

The App hasn't been working for a long time,since you changed the format of the downloads. Now subscribed shows simply get stuck or don't download at all. Before you changed the format of the files each episode downloaded with ease.  Android v [-1]

Absolutely useless to have lost the "LBC Catch Up" service, lost all the old vintage and past years shows...what a croc! App keeps crashing as have an old phone due to the fact I don't like listening on my phone but on my iPod. Put the catch up back and remodel this useless app!

terrible advert filled app that does LBC no justice what's so ever! every single time I leave the app and re-enter I get hit with another 10 second advert. weather I just left the app a min or a hour ago..save yourself time & the aggro. The app really is a joke now. After two 10 second adverts it's now just a blank black screen..they'd rather throw adverts at you then you actually listen to Lbc..I've just stopped listening now all together
Reply Content: Hi Francis, we're sorry for the ad experience and noted the feedback. We've fixed the issue in the latest release so you should be able to listen to LBC as normal without the blank screen crashes.

Review Content: Experiencing lots of issues playing LBC live today. App keeps crashing. Have uninstalled and reinstalled without any improvement.
More crashes with this app than an interview with Prince Andrew! The only thing that works is the adverts! Uninstalled!

So frustrating! I have listened to LBC for years, way back when most mobiles had a built in radio. But I've no idea why this app is no longer fit for purpose. After no more than ten minutes it stops! Can you please fix it??!!

My device gets disconnected from my phone quite often. I've tried different things such as uninstalling and reinstalling, changing my passwords. U get a message saying the cloud my leviton cloud service may be down. I tried tap my app and it asks for my password... seems like a crappy system. I would not reccomend this wifi switch. $64 a lot to pay for a little switch. I just saw two wifi switches for $40 at Costco!!!
Twice this week I've been signed out by the app. When I try to login it gives me a dialog box that their cloud service is going through a service outage. Not very reliable.
My app won't open past the "check your email" screen. I got the email, but it won't let me continue.
Lousy lousy lousy app, it freezes 80% of the time. Connectivity to switches is practically impossible.

Stays connected for a day or two then you have to go through the process again. Contacted help and was advise to do a few things but same results. Buy a regular switch and get up and turn it on and off save money and alot less hassle.
App does not work with Samsung Galaxy 20. Spent $2500 on newly installed Leviton smart switches and can't set them up.
Randomly just stops working. No feedback, no explanation, just stops. If you guys don't know how to keep your own services working, then find a consulting company that can do it for you.
Server down all the time. What's the point of smart feature if it's not working all the time!
Garbage. Doesn't work. Pain to setup and get working.

Unable to set up devices because the app won't connect with Leviton's server. (Other apps are able to download stuff at 25 mb/sec from other places.) The little plugin device makes itself available on wifi, but the software requires connection to a server in the cloud that's not working. Therefore the devices are made worthless.

I will never buy another product with this name. Had nothing but trouble from the beginning. Took me forever to get it set up, and even longer to link with my Google home. Every time we lost power I would have to set it up again and again until I threw it in the garbage. Save your money!!!

Terrible product, paid $50 for the switch download the app, installed it and took me hours trying to pair, no luck than went to home Depot replace the switch installed it took me about 45 minutes to pair and the switch last almost 3 weeks, remove the switch got installed a new one and it was impossible to pair, download 2 apps plus one for my iPad, and never work. So than I got on Amazon purchased a cheap one and bingo

Hot garbage. Tried the app to connect 2 switches, and 1 dimmer to wifi network. App failed to connect on both my wireless networks, sat for upwards of 20 minutes updating wifi information to switch. Embarrassing that these companies can't reliably produce an app to integrate their smart devices.

Do not update the firmware!!!! Latest firmware update broke the dimming ability of my switches causing it to flash lights at 100% brightness before it dims. This makes it real fun at night when you are trying to turn the lights on low and get a strobe light instead.
App has ALWAYS worked flawlessly for 2 years, until last update (1-29-2020) App will not open at all now. Please fix in a hurry.
Takea for ever to connect. Hit or miss connectivity. Device often loses connection to wifi. Pretty low end quality.
Trying to log in against a looping video is making me nauseous. Hope this gets removed soon.
App won't let me create an account. Sends a confirmation email that doesnt work.
Worst app. Could not connect after numerous tries.
Have been attempting to enroll these switches off and on for over a month with no success. Have been in contact with support who have been helpful but still nothing.
Out of the box the unit is very difficult to program, on my second day attempting to program.

I do not like the design of this app. It requires mobile and wi-fi connections to be enabled at the same time. It does not cache data and required constant refreshing of internet data. Also requires location services. Does not provide failure information for when devices do not connect. In the end I removed the application and returned the device to the retailer. I don't know why it didn't work and there was no useful information on Leviton's site, social media, etc... Thanks, but no thanks.
App will not open and allow device setup
App has become useless and now I have all these switches that I cant control. I've tried re-downloading it 12 times. App just shows a blank white screen.

I had to factory reset the device I was trying to connect to 6 TIMES before it would connect to Leviton's cloud. Strike one. There's no way to have the app scan your WiFi to find a device that is already connected to it because it uses a cloud service. Strike two. (I'm not fond of having my devices having to be constantly connected to an outside computer to work) Once in the settings menu for my device the app wouldn't back out to the operations menu. Strike three. Needs A LOT of work. Not ready for home use

Terrible app overall. If there's an update for this app, your switches or devices will NO longer work... even by physically pushing or interacting with them! I'm constantly having to delete my wireless devices and then re-add them, just to get them to work. But when the app/devices are all up to date, they work. There needs to be an "offline network" option, for those of us who don't use the internet features of this app and merely want to set up lights/devices on a schedule. Not impressed.

This app worked pretty well with my dimmer plug until a couple months ago. (It would need to be reset about once every 2 weeks, plus the reset button is so stiff it's painful to hold down) A couple of months ago it stopped connecting at all. I am not the kind of guy who likes to spend time with customer service, so I keep trying every couple of weeks or so to see if they've fixed it. No luck yet. I forgot that there were a couple weeks where it failed to install correctly on my Galaxy Note 5

I can connect one wifi switch, but then the others will not connect. If I disconnect the one that works and delete all its information from my network it will connect. have been working on this for 8 hours and only one will ever connect at a time. Also leviton, copying and pasting the same response to bad comments is lazy. Give solutions, not more work for your customers in your comments. Apparently merging with ConTech has taken you away from controls and shifted your focus towards fixtures.

Couldn't get a DW15S Decora Smart switch to show up on this app using my Moto X4 and Android Pie. It showed up on my Wifi app, and I was able to get it to connect, but would never allow me to progress past Step 2 in the app, where you jump to Wifi settings. Backing out of the app and restarting didn't help either. It would not show up as an added device. I was able to get it to work by using my Wife's Samsung Note which still has Android Oreo software. Worked fine there, and then it showed up on my Moto X4 and everything works well. Glad my other app developers are not behind the 8 ball when it comes to keeping up with Android software updates. Leviton really needs to get it together on supporting this app. Lots of disgruntled users. I'll probably move to the Lutron devices shortly. This was my first Leviton smart switch, and may be my last.
Reply Content: Thank you for your purchase and review.  We apologize for any difficulties you experienced with our app.  This issue will be fixed in an app update coming in the next week.

Review Content: Doesn't work on a Samsung S9. Trying just to do initial setup. On an S9, the dimmer switch comes up on wifi list as "uncondigured device xxx". If select this network in the app, it simply hangs indefinitely. Same issue on iPad, but comes up there as "Leviton xxx" in wifi list. Net/net unconfigurable. Gave up on support phone. Email back/forth is about 2 days per response with only questions, no answers...

3. Select the smart devices and state what they should do (Bedroom Dimmer to 33%). The app does not allow dimming settings during schedules even though the above statement taken from the My Leviton product description page says it does. Good looking app but does not function as advertised. Good looks are useless if it does not function.

App is unstable. Google Home hasn't been able to communicate w/it in months. My Leviton only loads blank screen saying "No internet connection," so now I can no longer reset Leviton device I'm trying to communicate with. This thing is basically now just a glorified dimmer switch. Joining beta now in hopes of improvement, because at this point I've got nothing to lose.

HATED THIS CRAPPY SETUP!! Wemo and Belkin were we easier to set up! This stupid app has the same setup instructions that most of these type of devices have, yet when something is simple as connecting it to Wi-Fi becomes impossible, it turns it into basically a child proof outlet plug. No matter how many times I reset the device, it was unrecognizable via Wi-Fi. Back to WeMo and Belkin it is!! (my young children could actually set WeMo and Belkin up by themselves, it's that easy, contrary to this crappy Leviton that was impossible to set up by one who has experience)

Kind of a hot mess. Couldn't get it to recognize my Leviton smart switch. Normal setup seems clunky. In the end the error message was Unknown error during "Add a device". If support can help me get it working, I'll post an update. Unlike most smart bulbs there seems to be no way to use these switches until configured.

Like many I am very disappointed in app. the light switch itself works great but this review is for the app which is one of the worst smart home apps out there. If you want to be able to turn on and off lights from app you can but if seeking any home automation and syncing with other apps like nest good luck. At $50 for a single wifi switch and not even being able to use for purpose advertised and why you got it is very disappointing

used it for one year with no problem ever since last update can't connect. my device link to another residence still in same house and wifi lol. after repeatedly clearing of cache& data and uninstalling/reinstalling when you open the app just goes straight to white screen. Support team expects me to unscrew open all the wallplate in my house to give them serial numbers because I have so much free time. don't waste your money.
Reply Content: Thank you for your purchase and review.  We apologize for any difficulties you experienced with our app.  This issue has been fixed in version 2.0.21 .  If you continue to have any issues please email us at DSSupport@leviton.com for assistance.

Review Content: Bought a bunch of the switches to control lights around the house with Alexa nearly 2 years ago and have had nothing but problems with the app, can't control lights! Have been turning them on and off manually. App won't even let us log into it any longer.

Absolutely ridiculous app. I really don't understand why I have to have secure login to switch my bedroom light on/off. The other problem is their customer support sucks. They don't listen to customers. I don't understand why it needs to be so complicated to add another person to be able to switch on/off the light. why we need to go seven level of security checks and validation after all this it still will not allow two people to use the app at the same time.

Way to update the app and not offer the old layout. The update is terrible. It makes it difficult and time consuming to do certain functions. I have 16 switches and multiple outlets. The update is all flash and no function. Very unhappy.
Reply Content: Thank you for your purchase and review.  We apologize for any difficulties you experienced with our app.  We have made changes to the new user interface that should make it much easier for you to use.  This change went out with version 2.0.20 of our app.

Review Content: The app will connect and work for about 30 seconds then loses connectivity. I have gone through the wifi setup several times and get various error messages. My router shows the device connected but can't control with the app. I am an engineer by trade and cannot get it to work. Junk.

Bad, very bad. I connected light switch, installed app, followed directions, could not connect. Called support and spent half hour resetting switch, force stopping appand trying again to go in circles and try again. I was told a rep would call today to troubleshoot more, no call. Thanks for nothing.

Update: this may be the worst app I've ever used. oof the password form becomes inaccessible if you don't adhere to the non stated guidelines. this all is rough. The add your location screen is totally broken. telling this app to skp this step wont allow you to proceed. entering your zip does nothing.
Reply Content: Thank you for your purchase and review.  We apologize for any difficulties you experienced with our app.  These issues will be fixed in an update coming soon.

Review Content: No longer works on wifi. Cannot update firmware on device because of this. This is the reason cloud based home automation is the worse. Interesting that the app can reach the light when on 4g and not locally. Most likely company trying to collect data illegally

Trying to register a new account... 20 minutes later still haven't received the verification email. Since I can't use the app or even the web interface this gets zero stars but google makes me give them one. Sounds like a very recent update was a big mistake for them.

The new update seems to focus on looks, not function or usability. Biggest problem is that adjusting or dimming lights is nested wayyyy too deep in new ui, and even worse for groups/rooms. V1 let me change this right from the main page... Bring it back!!
Reply Content: Thank you for your purchase and review.  We apologize for any difficulties you experienced with our app.  We have made changes to the new user interface that should make it much easier for you to use.  This change went out with version 2.0.20 of our app.

Review Content: The app has not worked properly for months and I've uninstalled it and reinstalled it and reset my Leviton multiple times. Big waste of money since I had to have an electrician install it because it's on a 3 way switch.

There is a functional impasse in the wifi device setup. One must connect to the leviton device's wifi to set it up, but then the app refuses to function because it is no longer connected to the cloud. Therefore setup cannot complete. What fool came up with this??

Do not buy any Leviton devices!!! Like many others have said, when trying to pair the switch it just never shows up. I have paired many devices in the past with ease. This Leviton timer switch is impossible. Waste of time and money!!!

Not impressed. Not like they say for hooking up. I am extremely frustrated with this app. Tried for support and on hold for over 30 min. Tried the website and it keeps putting me to someone who is an electrical assistant that gives me automated answers and then sends to a site that wants me to pay fornthebservice .

Can't create a residence because the city can't have a space and only letters???? I live in Saint Louis it can even be abbreviated with a period. Seriously? This is registration form 101, don't tell me where I live I don't care how you save the data in the DB. Validate on your side and scrub the data on the server. Come on...

i received an email but now I'm unable to authenticate, something about the cloud service being down. The switch isn't turning on my lights. does it have to be connected to wifi to turn on my lights? So far this thing sucks.

It just doesn't work, their technical support try to be helpful, but their technology is far from adequate. There's nothing so much fun as spending ages in a queue, only to have your call dropped when tier 1 support attempt to escalate your call to tier 2. Do yourself a favour and steer clear of Leviton.

It may not be the app, but my leviton wifi switch is good for a few days then disconnects. I've had to uninstall install and reinstall the app to reconfigure the switch several times over the past month.

I have a Galaxy S9 with Android 8.0.0.  I spent close to 2 hours on the phone with Leviton technical support today trying to set up a Decora dimmer switch.  Near the end the Leviton technician told me he thought I had a bad switch but as a last resort asked me if I had another device we could load "My Leviton" onto.  I installed the app on an iPad and set up the light switch with no problem.  The app doesn't work on a Galaxy S9.
Reply Content: Thank you for your purchase and review.  We apologize for any difficulties you experienced with our app.  This issue will be fixed in an app update coming in the next week.

Review Content: Doesn't work at all. Cannot add devices; the app just gets stuck on the Comnect to Device screen and never recognizes that it's connected to the dimmer.
All my devices went offline and won't reset. Also, my login to the app won't work and the password reset feature doesn't work. Don't buy these switches.

Worst smart app ever. it constantly disconnects from Google home. I get "sorry i couldn't reach leviton". Tp link Kasa blows this app away. I'm glad I only have one dimmer switch running off this app.
Reply Content: Thank you for your purchase and review.  We apologize for any difficulties you experienced with our app.  This was caused by an issue in our cloud service that we deployed a fix for on 2/5/19.  If you continue to have problems please email us at DSSupport@leviton.com for assistance.

Review Content: worthless app. identifies location but wont allow you to continue. so try to enter manually but app will not allow spaces in city name so good luck if you need two names. stuck now. wish i had not installed.
I had these lights for about a year now. They work and work great, but I wish there was an update all!!! Going in and updating each light one at a time is so irritating
Terrible device support and insanely complicated setup. Never was able to connect the device to their app. No after hours tech supoort. Do not buy.
it takes a long time to load when u first launch the app and when it does black screen. samsung note 9. Please fix. i spent 1000$ and now all of my wifi switches are useless.
Could at least use a widget and requires too many permissions (gps location should not be necessary to setup a switch). Will remove this as a standalone app if at all possible.
The My Leviton app update REMOVED the ability to set the dimmer level of lights when scheduling. Please put this feature back in. I can't understand why you would remove this in the first place.
after i connect to the dimmer plug ti wifi. i suppose to continue setup in app.. but no continue option etc.. whatever i do.. i can not finish to add device! customer service is not responsive
switches are good, but app crashes a lot since update. says cloud server experiencing problems.
Great until last update. Nothing but whitescreen of death now. Playing with permissions or reinstalling did not solve problem.
Reply Content: Thank you for your purchase and review.  We apologize for any difficulties you experienced with our app.  This issue has been fixed in version 2.0.21 .  If you continue to have any issues please email us at DSSupport@leviton.com for assistance.

Review Content: i can no longer dim my lights ad-hoc since the last update. i can only set dimming during scheduling setup but not on the fly..
Reply Content: Thank you for your purchase and review.  We apologize for any difficulties you experienced with our app.  We have made changes to the new user interface that should make it much easier for you to use.  This change went out with version 2.0.20 of our app.

Review Content: Buggy, wont connect to devices, waste of time.
been trying to download the app several times and keeps getting stuck at 14 percent I've reset my phone and wifi and no progress still not sure if my phone or app
Utter garbage. Flip a coin to see if you'll be able to turn on your lights today. A disappointment is the kindest way to describe it.
Wifi dimmers have issue with Google Assistant, they keep randomly disconnect. I read its a common issue and better off getting Lutron dimmers instead
Reply Content: Thank you for your purchase and review.  We apologize for any difficulties you experienced with our app.  This was caused by an issue in our cloud service that we deployed a fix for on 2/5/19.  If you continue to have problems please email us at DSSupport@leviton.com for assistance.

Review Content: used to work, now just a white screen. tried reinstalling, rebooting, all of it. no luck. Now i cant add the new dimmer i just bought.
Reply Content: Thank you for your purchase and review.  We apologize for any difficulties you experienced with our app.  This issue has been fixed in version 2.0.21 .  If you continue to have any issues please email us at DSSupport@leviton.com for assistance.

Review Content: App is very difficult to make WiFi changes to devices.
Garbage. Won't find my device. I keep getting an error. For over $40 I expect more from a product!
Always looses my devices. Always having to reconfigure the wireless config on my devices.
Won't allow me to add any new devices- keeps saying 'unknown error, contact customer support'...
new device cannot connect to Internet, light stays yellow
